actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution amending paragraph 6(j) of rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate.

summary.text: Amends rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that until the date of the sine die adjournment of the second session of the 95th Congress, a Senator, who on the day preceding the effective date of title I of the Committee System Reorganization Amendments of 1977 was serving as chairman or vice chairman of the Senate Subcommittee on Budget Authorization of the Select Committee on Intelligence, may continue to serve on such select committee in addition to serving on certain other committees.

titles.title: A resolution amending paragraph 6(j) of rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate.
